meanings.definition: Serving or tending to disjoin; separating
meanings.sent1: The disjunctives opinions of the group led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent2: The disjunctives paths in the forest made it hard to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The disjunctives colors of the painting clashed in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The disjunctives personalities of the twins were like night and day.
meanings.sent5: The disjunctives sounds of the instruments created a cacophony.
